summary: Completed comprehensive testing of bulk email validator application. Backend APIs working perfectly with 100% success rate. Frontend UI loads correctly with functional paste emails, CSV upload interface, results display, filtering, and export features. Navigation from paste emails to results page works correctly.
passed_tests: Backend API root endpoint responds correctly
Single email validation API works with query parameter
Bulk email validation creates jobs successfully
CSV upload validation processes files correctly
Job status retrieval shows progress and results
Job export functionality generates CSV files
Error handling for invalid requests works properly
Landing page loads with correct branding and layout
Paste emails tab accepts multiple email formats
Upload CSV tab shows proper dropzone interface
Navigation from landing to results page functions
Results page displays status cards with correct counts
Tab filtering (All, Valid, Invalid, Risky) works properly
Export dropdown shows all export options
Results table displays email validation details
Back button navigation returns to landing page
